meanings.sent1: She is the wenniest girl in our class.
meanings.sent2: The wenniest puppy in the litter was the smallest.
meanings.sent3: The wenniest flower in the garden seemed to sparkle in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the wenniest ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The wenniest star in the sky shone brightly above them.

meanings.sent1: That is the wenniest hat I have ever seen!
meanings.sent2: The wenniest cat in the neighborhood always naps in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The wenniest cloud in the sky looked like a fluffy pillow.
meanings.sent4: Her laugh was the wenniest melody in the room.
meanings.sent5: The wenniest tree in the forest stood tall and proud.
